channel.title: [delta] How to make a costum NPC stronger [delta] rep++
channel.description:
-how to make a costum npc stronger i mean with hit more - how to make a costum npc hit with range or mage - how to make a costum npc have more defence - how to make a costum npc hit throught prayer
if u guys can tell me i rep++ :o

item.title: [delta] How to make a costum NPC stronger [delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.source: [delta] How to make a costum NPC stronger [delta] rep++

item.title: [delta] How to make a costum NPC stronger [delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:2, topic:373933”][quote author=oldschool-scape link=topic=469923.msg3435805#msg3435805 date=1292754403]
-how to make a costum npc stronger i mean with hit more

  • how to make a costum npc hit with range or mage
  • how to make a costum npc have more defence
  • how to make a costum npc hit throught prayer

if u guys can tell me i rep++ :o
[/quote]

  1. Follow my tutorial. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457701.0.html

  2. Isin’t this pretty much self-explanatory?

  3. Go to ( ( npcHandler.java ) ) and search for

int rand = misc.random(def);

And add your npc to the list.

  1. Go to ( ( npcHandler.java ) ) and search for
plr.ProtMage, plr.ProtMelee, plr.ProtRange

And make your npc hit through prayer. Just look how others are set-up and use 'em.[/quote]

ur my hero much searched long time for this rep++ ( but ur already full)

Read full topic
item.source: [delta] How to make a costum NPC stronger [delta] rep++

item.title: [delta] How to make a costum NPC stronger [delta] rep++
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:1, topic:373933”]-how to make a costum npc stronger i mean with hit more

  • how to make a costum npc hit with range or mage
  • how to make a costum npc have more defence
  • how to make a costum npc hit throught prayer

if u guys can tell me i rep++ :o[/quote]

  1. Follow my tutorial. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457701.0.html

  2. Isin’t this pretty much self-explanatory?

  3. Go to ( ( npcHandler.java ) ) and search for

int rand = misc.random(def);

And add your npc to the list.

  1. Go to ( ( npcHandler.java ) ) and search for
plr.ProtMage, plr.ProtMelee, plr.ProtRange

And make your npc hit through prayer. Just look how others are set-up and use 'em.

Read full topic
